text: This beginner’s reading article talks about likes and dislikes.There are three names: Bill (比尔), Kelly (凯利), and Jim (吉姆).我叫比尔。我有两个好朋友，凯利和吉姆。我们都喜欢早餐吃热狗，午餐吃鸡肉和土豆。凯利喜欢胡萝卜和西红柿。吉姆不喜欢。他只喜欢西兰花。吉姆和我晩饭喜欢吃冰淇淋和沙拉。但是凯利喜欢茄子和大米。My name is Bill. I have two good friends, Kelly and Jim.We all like to eat hot dogs for breakfast and chicken and potatoes for lunch.Kelly likes carrots and tomatoes. Jim doesn’t like it. He only likes broccoli.Jim and I like to eat ice cream and salad. But Kelly likes eggplant and rice.1 – 凯利喜欢米饭吗？a. 她不喜欢。b. 她喜欢。2 – 吉姆喜欢什么蔬菜？a. 他喜欢吃西兰花b. 他喜欢吃胡萝卜c. 他喜欢吃比萨d. 他喜欢吃茄子1. a2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
